One class can be written. It will take the name of the workbook from
the sy=
stem e.g.
  java -DWORKBOOK=3Dabc.xls junit.textui.TestRunner TestWBK
Withi=
n Java, then we can use
  private String workbook =3D System.getProperty("W=
ORKBOOK");
to get the workbookname.

Multiple parameters can also be passed=
 as separate parameters or in
the same parameter separated by a delimitor.
=

Hope this helps.............Vijay.
